channel.title: Was the Gluon a new weapon added to Black Mesa?
channel.description: I haven't finished the original half life yet, and I was wondering, is the Gluon a new weapon? I haven't seen it in the original half life, and I was just wondering. :slight_smile: :bms:

item.title: Was the Gluon a new weapon added to Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
The gluon gun is not a new weapon. Here it is in the original Half-Life:

youtube.com/watch?v=mebS3V65AAc

Read full topic
item.source: Was the Gluon a new weapon added to Black Mesa?
